        public BeelineServletFilter.Builder setIncludePaths​(List<String> includePaths)
        Set the Ant patterns for matching requests to include when tracing.

        Optional. By default all requests are included.

        Parameters:
        includePaths - the Ant patterns for matching requests to include
        Returns:
        this

      • setExcludePaths

        public BeelineServletFilter.Builder setExcludePaths​(List<String> excludePaths)
        Set the Ant patterns for matching requests to exclude when tracing.

        Optional. By default no requests are excluded.

        Returns:
